title: WTB: T207 Hooper, Lewis and/or Speaker
author: Tripp Trapp

posts.post_title: WTB: T207 Hooper, Lewis and/or Speaker
posts.post_content: Trying to put together the “Golden Outfield.” Please PM or email me if you have any mid-grade Hooper, Lewis and/or Speaker you may be interested in selling/trading. Thanks!

Hello,

There's an SGC 60 D. Lewis in the current Sterling Auction.  Its a tough one to find at EX or above.

--
Mike
